attributes.action: Pause all overseas spending untill zero uk homelessness
attributes.additional_details: Put the GREAT back into Great Britain.  Get this country running properly before sending our money overseas. Tackle one thing at a time and pause any money leaving until our country is running the way it should be and put us first before any over seas country
attributes.background: Pause all overs spending  , stop any money going out of the uk until we have zero homelessness on uk streets. Once homelessness is tackled move on to NHS then schools, emergency services etc etc, tackle one thing at a time instead of everything at once and messing it all up.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Stop spending taxpayer money on foreign aid: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649262
